analysis.description:
AuctionBase._escrow (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#164-170) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(_owner,this,_totalTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#169-170)

AuctionBase._transfer (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#174-180) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(_receiver,_totalTokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#180)

AuctionBase._approve (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#377-393) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.approve(_approved,_tokenQuantity) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#387-392)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#465-515):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_totalQuantity)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#470-471)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- auctionCounter (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#502-505)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#465-515):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_totalQuantity)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#470-471)
	- _escrow(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_totalQuantity) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#505)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensAuction (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#512-514)

Reentrancy in SaleClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#633-681):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_tokenQuantity)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#637-639)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in SaleClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#633-681):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_tokenQuantity)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#637-639)
	- _escrow(_tokenAddress,msg.sender,_tokenQuantity) (/unique_chucks/14/0xc3cb67158b87fd0615bf5976ea33f86bb10f198a.sol#670-671)
